title: Alarm for Android Wear
summary: Easy set/on/off weekly alarm. Link with Google Calendar events to on/off alarm.
description: Alarm for Android Wear to easy set, turn on/off weekly alarm.Tested with LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Moto 360, SmartWatch3.*If app is not getting installed on android wear, wait for while or try "resync app" on android wear management app.*If Alarm is not syncing between wear and mobile after update, please try uninstall / reinstall app.**In battery optimization (or power saving or stamina or similar function), exclude Android Wear and this app. Else, Alarm may not go off on time.Features:- Add multiple alarms- Set weekly alarms- Simple switch on/off- 5 vibrate patterns- Configurable snooze mode- Link with Google Calendar event, to enable / disable alarm.- Alarm set to wear, wear and mobile, or mobile side.- Simple swipe to stop, Shake to stop alarm, Notification, or Vibration only mode.- One shot for one-time only alarm- Label (add / edit label on mobile side)e.g. Mon - Fri 12:50 lunch time end alarm, turn off alarm if there's Google Calendar event with keyword "holiday".Permissions are used to get Google Calendar data.Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons.
descriptionHTML:
Alarm for Android Wear to easy set, turn on/off weekly alarm.
Tested with LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Moto 360, SmartWatch3.

*If app is not getting installed on android wear, wait for while or try "resync app" on android wear management app.
*If Alarm is not syncing between wear and mobile after update, please try uninstall / reinstall app.
**In battery optimization (or power saving or stamina or similar function), exclude Android Wear and this app. Else, Alarm may not go off on time.

Features:

- Add multiple alarms
- Set weekly alarms
- Simple switch on/off
- 5 vibrate patterns
- Configurable snooze mode
- Link with Google Calendar event, to enable / disable alarm.
- Alarm set to wear, wear and mobile, or mobile side.
- Simple swipe to stop, Shake to stop alarm, Notification, or Vibration only mode.
- One shot for one-time only alarm
- Label (add / edit label on mobile side)

e.g. Mon - Fri 12:50 lunch time end alarm, turn off alarm if there's Google Calendar event with keyword "holiday".

Permissions are used to get Google Calendar data.

Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons.
comments: Maybe I'm just dumb, that I can't figure out how to set an alarm using this app. At this point, I'm uninstalling it and I'll look for something else that's easier to use.
Matthew Howell, I had the same problem. I had to uninstall and install again on my phone. I also had to install on my watch, then I was able to set alarms. Hope you get it to work.
It would be perfect if you could change snooze time

I'd vote 5 stars, but if the watch is too far away from your phone it only vibrates once (not enough to wake you) then stops.  You can't trust it.  All I want is for the vibrate feature to work, and keep buzzing strongly until I wake and shut it off.  Is that too much to ask?

Been using it for a while on my asus zenwatch 2. This app is much better than the default alarm app in wear. But waht makes this deserve 5 star is the terrific support from tje developer. I requested a feature (not very complex) and it was implemented in few hours. That was just awesome!
So far, the only alarm app that vibrates even on theater mode on AW. That alone makes it worth 5 stars!
recentChanges: Added option "Start hour of day" for filtering calendar events.
